## Purpose ðŸŽ“ Learning Gatsby | Contentful | GraphQL

Purpose was to create a personal blog using Gatsby and use a CMS - Contentful to pass content onto the site. Learnt more about graphQL as well in querying data and describing the data that was needed.

## 2023 Update 

I would like to document my journey into Data Engineering by creating blog posts of the topics I am currently studying and summarising my understandings of them. Through this I hope to challenge myself to be more assertive and confident in public while learning new topics 

## Built with

- [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/)
- [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/)

## Upcoming Features

- Create Tags based on keywords from posts
- Bookmark favourite posts which uses localStorage

## [Deployment](https://public.josiahsingh.now.sh/)

Deployed with [Now.sh](https://zeit.co/now)

## Author

Josiah Singh
